Name: Achilles
About the game: Achilles is a light, single player turn based sci-fi strategy game in a classic top-down board game style. Each game may take anywhere from five minutes to half an hour on average. Features Generate and save procedurally generated random maps Force selection and random events allow players to customize each game Six unique unit types with a variety of weapons and abilities Choose Industrial, High Tech, Elite Military or Balanced force In-game information reference Game Play Fog of war Resource accumulation New unit generation and repair/resupply Choose victory by base capture/unit elimination, or point total In-game documentation
Meta Title: Achilles: May 17, 2019, Bob Tedesco Jr and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Achilles? Check out the release date (May 17, 2019), developer insights from Bob Tedesco Jr, and a complete game summary.
